messages.alpha: The {_field_} may only contain alphabetic characters
messages.alpha_num: The {_field_} may only contain alpha-numeric characters
messages.alpha_dash: The {_field_} may contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
messages.alpha_spaces: The {_field_} may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
messages.digits: The {_field_} must be numeric and exactly contain {length} digits
messages.dimensions: The {_field_} must be {width} pixels by {height} pixels
messages.email: The {_field_} must be a valid email
messages.excluded: The {_field_} is not a valid value
messages.ext: The {_field_} is not a valid file
messages.max: The {_field_} may not be greater than {length} characters
messages.mimes: The {_field_} must have a valid file type
messages.min: The {_field_} must be at least {length} characters
messages.numeric: The {_field_} may only contain numeric characters
messages.oneOf: The {_field_} is not a valid value
messages.size: The {_field_} size must be less than {size}KB
